alert.note: Alert for Hardee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 02 at 8:12PM EDT until November 02 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Hardee County in central Florida... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 812 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wauchula, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Wauchula, Bowling Green, Zolfo Springs, Ona, Limestone and Crewsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
